text: "There Must Be an Angel (Playing with My Heart)" is a 1985 song by Eurythmics. It is the second single from their fourth studio album Be Yourself Tonight. It topped the single charts in Finland, Ireland, Norway, the United Kingdom. It was their only chart topper in the United Kingdom. It also made the top 40 in the United States. It was covered by German band No Angels in 2001. ==Track listings== *7-inch single :A. "There Must Be an Angel (Playing with My Heart)" (7â€³ edit) - 4:36 :B. "Grown Up Girls" - 4:17 *12-inch single :A. "There Must Be an Angel (Playing with My Heart)" (LP version) - 5:22 :B. "Grown Up Girls" - 4:17 *12-inch single (Special Dance Mix) :A. "There Must Be an Angel (Playing with My Heart)" (Special Dance Mix) - 6:20 :B.
